titles.title: To extend and modify the temporary suspension of duty on certain catalytic converter mats of ceramic fibers.
To extend and modify the temporary suspension of duty on certain catalytic converter mats of ceramic fibers.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide, through December 31, 2011, for the temporary suspension of duty on certain catalytic converter mats of ceramic fibers.
